body:
Because it's important.

So very simple question. Over the past 1 year on Avicus, what has changed, and what has stayed the same? Just name some things, how they happened, what they caused (or didn't), what failed, what succeeded, why these things happened. 

(This post will likely be ignored but it's more important than you think)
body_tagged:
Because it's important.

So very simple question. Over the past 1 year on Avicus, what has changed, and what has stayed the same? Just name some things, how they happened, what they caused (or didn't), what failed, what succeeded, why these things happened. 

(This post will likely be ignored but it's more important than you think)
title: Avicus - Changes and Continuities Over Time

replies.body: Avicus has changed starting here!
replies.body_tagged: Avicus has changed starting here!

replies.body:
- Social Media Team formed
- Translation project has slowed
- Builders have been readded
- Head map developer changes (Fouled, Seth, Distraction) now lead
- New tournaments
- XML has been tremendously revitalized
- Throwback has been removed
- We now have a Discord server
- Tons of new staff
- Prestiges have been readded
replies.body_tagged:
- Social Media Team formed
- Translation project has slowed
- Builders have been readded
- Head map developer changes (Fouled, Seth, Distraction) now lead
- New tournaments
- XML has been tremendously revitalized
- Throwback has been removed
- We now have a Discord server
- Tons of new staff
- Prestiges have been readded

replies.body: -Player count has gone down over time
replies.body_tagged: -Player count has gone down over time

replies.body: I have recently been put in charge of the social media team where we have gone from no leadership to a point by point plan to revive the team and add new features so we are able to market the server better and hopefully in the new feature focus on bringing player counts up.
replies.body_tagged: I have recently been put in charge of the social media team where we have gone from no leadership to a point by point plan to revive the team and add new features so we are able to market the server better and hopefully in the new feature focus on bringing player counts up.

replies.body: For the past year, nah. Stayed the same.
replies.body_tagged: For the past year, nah. Stayed the same.

reply_to.body: -Player count has gone down over time
reply_to.body_tagged: -Player count has gone down over time

replies.body:
• CTF, KoTH/CP and DTC were added
  • CTW, TDM and Nexus were removed and added back soon after.
  • Frenzy and SkyWars were added and removed soon after.
  • CTH, Walls and SG were removed.

  • Staff teams have changed a lot.
  • New communication server has appeared.
  • New game engine was developed.
  • A lot of new maps were added.
  • Prestiges are back.

  • Average maximum players count has dropped.
  • Support of new versions was added with bugs and lags.
  • A lot of old nice maps were removed or even deleted forever.

But some things don't change:
  • Avicus is still 1.8+
  • Arcade is still coming Soon™
